TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendedUIService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines the methods that workflow designer hosts can call to perform advanced UI operations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
The methods and properties provided by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IExtendedUIService> allow designer hosts to navigate to properties in the property browser window and allow the hosts to add task items to the task list.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddAssemblyReference (System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddAssemblyReference(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName) cil managed

Docs.param: An that identifies the assembly to add.
Docs.summary: Instructs the workflow designer host to add an assembly reference for the current project to access.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddDesignerActions (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction[] actions);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddDesignerActions(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction[] actions) cil managed

Docs.param: A array that contains the actions to add.
Docs.summary: Adds an array of designer actions to the list of available user actions in the workflow designer host.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult AddWebReference (out Uri url, out Type proxyClass);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult AddWebReference(class System.Uri url, class System.Type proxyClass) cil managed

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains a that represents the universal resource locator (URL) of the Web resource to provide the project access to. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this method returns, contains a of the proxy class associated with the Web resource. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Adds a reference to a Web resource to a project in a workflow designer.
Docs.returns: A value that indicates the return value of the **Add Web Reference** dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public Type GetProxyClassForUrl (Uri url);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetProxyClassForUrl(class System.Uri url) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the type of the proxy class associated with the specified universal resource locator (URL).

Docs.summary: Provides contextual information about the current component.

MemberSignature.Value: public Uri GetUrlForProxyClass (Type proxyClass);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Uri GetUrlForProxyClass(class System.Type proxyClass) cil managed

Docs.param: The associated with the proxy class.
Docs.summary: Returns the universal resource locator (URL) for the Web resource associated with the specified proxy class.
Docs.returns: The URL for the Web resource associated with the proxy class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string,Type> GetXsdProjectItemsInfo ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, class System.Type> GetXsdProjectItemsInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the types that are generated for the XSD schema that is added to the workflow project.
Docs.returns: The types that are generated for the XSD schema that is added to the workflow project.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool NavigateToProperty(string propName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property to navigate to.
Docs.summary: Navigates to the specified property in the property browser of the workflow designer host.
Docs.returns: if the property was navigated to successfully; otherwise, .

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveDesignerActions() cil managed
